item.title: About Me
item.description: “Hello Devs” Career I’ve been a software developer since 2003 (16 years at the time of creating this site). Currently I work for a very large Fortune 50 company. During the course of that time I’ve been fortunate to gain a lot of experience in quite a few technologies. Lately I’ve been doing some Java Spring Boot API’s for some of our internal backend software. Prior to that I was working in a research area and got to build proof of concept ideas that showcased newer software, databases and cloud functionality.
